name: Ringtone Media Studio DJ Ringtone Project
summary: Learn about .DJR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Avanquest Ringtone Media Suite has been discontinued.

description: Project file created by Ringtone Media Studio, a program used for making mobile phone ringtones; saves a DJ Ringtone project, which includes guitar, keyboard, drum, and other instrument tracks; used for constructing .MIDI ringtones.
